paper.title: The lending risk predicting of the folk informal financial organization from big data using the deep learning hybrid model
paper.abstract: This article is first to predict and earlier warning folk lending risk used deep learning hybrid model, we find that the LSTM hybrid model has a higher predict accuracy on lending risk fore-casting and earlier warning of the FIFO, with an obviously improvement of the average value of forecasting accuracy. The predict accuracy of LSTM-GRU and LSTM-CNN models on lending risk forecasting of the FIFO is higher than others during COVID-19 pandemic. Therefore, we believe that the LSTM hybrid model, especially the LSTM-GRU model can better predict and early warn lending risk of the FIFO on big data.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用深度学习混合模型（如LSTM-GRU和LSTM-CNN）来预测和预警民间非正式金融组织的贷款风险，这直接属于金融风险管理的范畴。
